mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_blog (blog_id, blog_title, blog_content, blog_summary,blog_html, author_id, tags,category_id,topic_id,create_at,create_by, update_at, update_by, delete_flag) VALUES (#{blogId},#{blogTitle},#{blogContent},#{blogSummary},#{blogHtml},#{authorId},#{tags},#{categoryId},#{topicId},CURRENT_TIME,#{authorId},CURRENT_TIME,#{authorId},'0') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE blog_title=#{blogTitle}, blog_content=#{blogContent}, blog_html=#{blogHtml}, author_id=#{authorId}, tags=#{tags}, category_id=#{categoryId}, topic_id=#{topicId}, update_at=CURRENT_TIME, update_by=#{authorId}

INSERT INTO b_temp_blog (temp_blog_id, temp_blog_title, temp_blog_content, temp_blog_html, temp_author_id, temp_tags,temp_category_id,temp_topic_id,create_at, create_by, update_at, update_by, delete_flag) VALUES (#{blogId},#{blogTitle},#{blogContent},#{blogHtml},#{authorId},#{tags},#{categoryId},#{topicId},CURRENT_TIME,#{authorId},CURRENT_TIME,#{authorId},'0')
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE temp_blog_title=#{blogTitle}, temp_blog_content=#{blogContent}, temp_blog_html=#{blogHtml}, temp_author_id=#{authorId}, temp_tags=#{tags}, temp_topic_id=#{topicId}, temp_category_id=#{categoryId}, update_at=CURRENT_TIME, update_by=#{authorId}
mapper.select: SELECT blog_id, blog_title, blog_summary,blog_content, blog_html, author_id,category_id,topic_id,tags, create_at, create_by, update_at, update_by, delete_flag FROM b_blog WHERE blog_id=#{blogId}
